posts.message: YC is still accepting late applications, so HURRY UP!!

What about Egyptian-Geeks-Weekly :-D ?! 
A website that spreads the knowledge and experience of this group's experts in their fields. I know that members will have limited time to write posts for this project, but it would be easy if we had more experts to contribute.
What about having departments for technologies; languages, front-end, back-end, big data, machine learning, Software design, security, best practices, etc. 
I think it will make a difference and improve developers' quality. 
Does this idea worth consideration or "kollo fel keltsh" :-D ??

I have a table of events each with date and time. what's the best practice to send a notification to all users who subscribed to each event at the event date:time. what I did, for now creating a service to check the coming events and if event time == current time then sends notification and I keep this service running forever.

My question isn't about notification itself, it's how to fire a notification action on the event date:time.

I thought I could share this with you, may people I know will certainly like this. Remember Design Patterns :D the very first book that was written about them was published in 1995 by The Gang of Four. This guy here has taken a very good initiative to bring back design patterns to the 21st century and reapplying them to modern languages
